dublin_core.dcvalue: With the increasing popularity of the Internet as a primary medical information source it is critical for pathologists to be able to use and evaluate both general medical and pathology related Web sites Several published models for evaluating Web sites prove cumbersome to use and often involve computer or statistic based algorithms
Archives of pathology And laboratory medicine
The Internet for pathologists: a simple schema for evaluating pathology-related Web sites and a catalog of sites useful for practicing pathologists.
